Workflow.Name: ReviewHub - Sync Logo Images from Blob Storage
Workflow.Description:
This flow is responsible for pulling the images for each product from the blob storage where they are currently being stored to dataverse.
Failure of this flow would result in missing product images in Review Hub.

LocalizedName.description: ReviewHub - Sync Logo Images from Blob Storage

Description.description:
This flow is responsible for pulling the images for each product from the blob storage where they are currently being stored to dataverse.
Failure of this flow would result in missing product images in Review Hub.
